Welcome to my Portfolio!

I am Adrian Garcia (Morpho), a passionate 3D artist with a solid background and a career characterized by the constant pursuit of excellence and innovation in the field of 3D design.

Courses:

My proficiency in 3D design has been forged through rigorous academic training. I have completed specialized courses that have strengthened my technical and creative foundation. Courses from Futurly (Houdini for Architects, Mechanomorph Interoperability Course), from Design Morphin & Parametric Architecture. As well as multiple Youtube courses about Houdini, Unreal Engine 5, Blender and ZBrush (also some Patreon).My general learning was trial and error

Design Philosophy:

Each of my 3D works is the result of exhaustive research aimed at discovering new methods and establishing a unique style. Over the years, I have refined my approach to maintain a stylistic coherence, yet I also possess the versatility to deviate from this framework when creativity demands it.

Software:

I leverage various industry-standard software tools in my work, including but not limited to:

  • Houdini
  • Blender
  • DAZ Studio
  • ZBrush
  • Unreal Engine
  • Adobe (Photoshop, Premier, After Effects, Illustrator)
  • TouchDesigner
  • Reality Capture
  • Render (Cycles, Ray Tracing, Octane)

I invite you to explore my portfolio and discover the diversity and quality of my work. If you are interested in collaboration opportunities or wish to learn more about my creative process, feel free to get in touch. Thank you for visiting!
